description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Med. blue, drk teal, olive warp. Drk blue, green & metallic blue weft.  Plain weave variation. Stapled to 8.5x11\" card along with 99.1.1213.14.  \"H-8B\" written on card. (blue, green, olive)
title: Lapis Development Sample
